review: It was easy to setup and use daily

review: Not good. It freezes up a lot. And won't donanything. I have to repeatedly in plug it.

review: Great interface!!! Easy set up, and the remote is nice to hold vs the Apple TV remote.

review: Thought this was going to be like Chromecast. Turns out it's a lot cooler. It has the ability to cast everything like Chromecast, but it's interface is much better.
author: Lora D.
